data.event: The statistics will detail graduation outcomes for students who entered the ninth-grade for the first time in 2004 and were scheduled to graduate in spring 2008.

event.title: were scheduled to graduate in spring 2008

data.event: The statistics will detail graduation outcomes for students who entered the ninth-grade for the first time in 2004 and were scheduled to graduate in spring 2008.
The reports are in concert with the Virginia On-Time Graduation Rate reports published last October and will include dropout rates for the commonwealth, school divisions and schools.
